pageContext.description: A small format half-length portrait of Martin Luther, facing to his right against a blue background with his hands in front of him. He is wearing a black beret and a black gown, and appears to be holding something with both hands. [cda 2020]
pageContext.dimensions:
Dimensions of support: 19.6 x 14.5 cm
